content: pattern written using us terms place first stitch of each row in same stitch as turning you can either add 3/4 buttons no buttonholes necessary or attach a zipper to your finished cardigan all of the sizes are published on my blog this is a printable compilation of all sizes in pdf format all sizes >> https //hearthookhome com/cozy-classroom-cardigan-size-1416-youth-large/ see a bunch of photos and grab the adult sizes small - 3xl tall >> https //hearthookhome com/cozy-coed-cardigan-crochet-pattern-sizes-adult-small-3xl-tall/
